TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit QueryStringConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 這個類別會將查詢字串中的參數轉換成適當型別的物件，

span.span: This class converts a parameter in a query string to an object of the appropriate type.

summary.span: 也可以將參數從物件轉換成為它的查詢字串表示。

span.span: It can also convert a parameter from an object to its query string representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數可以在 URL 內的查詢字串中指定。Parameters can be specified in a query string within a URL. 這個類別採用在字串中指定的那些參數，並且將它們轉換成物件。This class takes those parameters specified in a string and converts them into objects. 例如，下列合約會經過定義。For example, the following contract is defined. ``` [ServiceContract] interface Calculator { [WebGet(UriTemplate="Add?n1={n1}&n2={n2}")] [OperationContract] long Add(long n1, long n2); } ``` Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務會實作這個介面，並公開的端點上在http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService。A Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service implements this interface and exposes it on an endpoint with the at http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService. `Add`可以藉由傳送至 HTTP GET 呼叫服務作業http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService/Add?n1=10&n2=5。The `Add` service operation can be called by sending an HTTP GET to http://localhost:8000/MyCalcService/Add?n1=10&n2=5. 會接收此 URL，並將 URL 中指定的兩個參數 (n1 和 n2) 轉換成兩個有適當值的 `long` 物件。The receives this URL and converts the two parameters (n1 and n2) specified in the URL into two `long` objects with the appropriate values. 您可以從 衍生類別，以控制查詢字串參數如何對應至服務作業的參數。You can derive a class from to control how query string parameters are mapped into a service operation's parameters. 根據預設， 支援下列型別：The supports the following types by default: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 陣列 array - - - - 列舉Enums - 具有可以在型別和字串表示之間相互轉換之 `TypeConverterAttribute` 的型別。Types that have a `TypeConverterAttribute` that can convert the type to and from a string representation. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何使用 類別，在字串和 32 位元整數之間進行轉換。The following code shows how to use the class to convert between a string and a 32-bit integer. [!code-csharp[QueryStringConverter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[QueryStringConverter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/vb/program.vb#0)]

summary.span: 將查詢字串參數轉換成指定的型別。

span.span: Converts a query string parameter to the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `parameterType` 是實值型別，而且參數為 `null`，則會傳回 `parameterType` 的預設值。If the `parameterType` is a value type and the parameter is `null`, then the default value of the `parameterType` is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將字串轉換為指定的型別。The following code shows how to convert a string to the specified type. [!code-csharp[QueryStringConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[QueryStringConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/querystringconverter/vb/program.vb#2)]

exception.span: 提供的字串格式不正確。

span.span: The provided string does not have the correct format.
